messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I am currently representing a case and need to gather information from the codes and constitution of the U.S. states to aid in my defense, except for Delaware, Nevada, New York, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Tennessee, Vermont, West Virginia. Please provide the following information as of 2025-07-01 in a tabular format:
State Name, Current Constitution Effective Date(YYYY-MM-DD), Number of Constitutional Amendments, Number of Articles in Current Constitution.

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following column names in order:
State Name, Current Constitution Effective Date, Number of Constitutional Amendments, Number of Articles in Current Constitution.
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

<think>
We need to gather the required data on each state's constitution and amendments excluding those specified. We'll start by querying for the current constitution effective date for each state.
</think>

<search> current constitution effective date of all US states except Delaware, Nevada, New York, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Tennessee, Vermont, West Virginia </search>

Search query: current constitution effective date of all US states except Delaware, Nevada, New York, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Tennessee, Vermont, West Virginia
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_U.S._states_by_date_of_admission_to_the_Union):
List of U.S. states by date of admission to the Union - Wikipedia Articles of Confederation ratification dates​​ The Articles of Confederation came into force on March 1, 1781, after being ratified by all 13 states. On March 4, ...

[Doc 2](https://www.congress.gov/crs-product/R47747):
Admission of States to the Union: A Historical Reference Guide This report provides historical information about each state's journey to statehood with a focus on the role of Congress.

[Doc 3](https://bensguide.gpo.gov/j-states-ratification?highlight=WyJjb25zdGl0dXRpb24iLCJjb25zdGl0dXRpb24ncyJd):
States and Dates of Ratification On December 7, 1787, Delaware was the first state to vote in favor of, or ratify, it. New Hampshire became the ninth state to accept the Constitution.

Since the list isn't directly provided here, we need to look up specific state details individually.

Let’s proceed with looking at each state’s constitution effective date.
</think>

<search> California constitution effective date </search>

Search query: California constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://capitolweekly.net/effective-versus-operative-dates-of-statutes/):
Effective versus operative dates of statutes - Capitol Weekly January 1 following the year a bill is enacted is the most common effective date. It is basically the “default” effective date, unless the statute specifies ...

[Doc 2](https://ballotpedia.org/California_Constitution):
California Constitution - Ballotpedia On May 7, 1879, the constitution was approved with nearly 78,000 in favor to 67,000 opposed. Voters rejected proposals for a constitutional convention in 1898, ...

[Doc 3](https://guides.ll.georgetown.edu/c.php?g=275786&p=6844888):
Constitution - California Resources The first Constitution of California was ratified on November 13, 1849, prior to California's admittance into the Union in 1850. California's ...

Based on these, let’s continue with each state.

<search> Florida constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Florida constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.flsenate.gov/laws/constitution):
The Florida Constitution Effective date of laws.—Each law shall take effect on the sixtieth day after adjournment sine die of the session of the legislature in which enacted or ...

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Florida):
Constitution of Florida - Wikipedia The current constitution of Florida was ratified on November 5, 1968, and has been modified by initiative and referendum several times since.

[Doc 3](https://50constitutions.org/fl/constitution):
Florida Constitution The Florida Constitution · As Revised in 1968 and Subsequently Amended · Preamble · Declaration of Rights · General Provisions · Legislature.

Let’s move forward systematically.

<search> Georgia constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Georgia constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Georgia_(U.S._state)):
Constitution of Georgia (U.S. state) The current and tenth Georgia State Constitution was ratified on November 2, 1982, replacing the previous 1976 constitution. Amendments to the Constitution may ...

[Doc 2](https://libguides.law.gsu.edu/c.php?g=253377&p=1689690):
LibGuides: Georgia Legal Research: Constitution Georgia's current constitution was adopted in November 1982, and became effective July 1983. The 1983 Georgia Constitution was Georgia's tenth constitution.

[Doc 3](https://www.georgiaencyclopedia.org/articles/government-politics/georgia-constitution/):
Georgia Constitution On September 25, 1981, the General Assembly approved the new constitution. Amended at the 1982 session of the legislature, the proposed constitution was ...

Continuing this process for each state:

<search> Illinois constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Illinois constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://lrb.ilga.gov/Commission/lrb/conent.htm):
Illinois Constitution - Legislative Reference Bureau EFFECTIVE DATE OF LAWS The General Assembly shall provide by law for a uniform effective date for laws passed prior to June 1 of a calendar year. The General ...

[Doc 2](https://www.ilsos.gov/departments/archives/online-exhibits/100-documents/1818-il-con.html):
5. Illinois Constitution (1818) - ILSOS.gov Illinois Constitution (1818) Background: On April 18, 1818, President James Monroe signed legislation known as the Enabling Act, which laid out the ...

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Illinois):
Constitution of Illinois - Wikipedia The resulting fourth version of the Illinois Constitution was ratified by special election on December 15, 1970, and went into effect on July 1, 1971.

...

Repeat this process for remaining states.
</think>

After gathering data on each state, we can compile it into the required format.

<search> Michigan constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Michigan constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Michigan):
Constitution of Michigan - Wikipedia Constitution of the State of Michigan of 1963. Created, August 1, 1962. Ratified, June 20, 1963. Date effective, January 1, 1964. Location, Library of Michigan.

[Doc 2](https://www.legislature.mi.gov/Laws/MCL?objectName=mcl-Article-IV-3):
MCL - Article IV § 3 - Michigan Legislature This amendment to the Constitution of Michigan of 1963 became effective December 22, 2018. Constitutionality: The United States Supreme Court held in ...

[Doc 3](https://www.legislature.mi.gov/Laws/MCL?objectName=mcl-Article-VI-1):
MCL - Article VI § 1 - Michigan Legislature This amendment to the Constitution of Michigan of 1963 became effective December 22, 2018. Constitutionality: Const 1963, art 6, § 1 and art 9, §§ 1 and 3 ...

...
<search> Ohio constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Ohio constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://ballotpedia.org/Ohio_Constitution):
Ohio Constitution - Ballotpedia The current Ohio Constitution was adopted in 1851. · Ohio has had two state constitutions. · The current state constitution has 19 articles. · The current Ohio ...

[Doc 2](https://codes.ohio.gov/ohio-constitution/article-1):
Article I - Ohio Constitution - Ohio Laws Effective: September 1, 1851. All men are, by nature, free and independent ... (4) to reasonable protection from the accused or any person acting on behalf of the ...

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Ohio):
Constitution of Ohio - Wikipedia The current constitution dates to 1851, although it has been substantially amended. ... This has come to be considered the date of Ohio statehood. Judge ...
<search> Pennsylvania constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Pennsylvania constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.legis.state.pa.us/WU01/LI/LI/CT/HTM/00/00.htm):
CONSTITUTION OF PENNSYLVANIA The Constitution of 1874 was adopted November 3, 1873, by a Constitutional Convention which was called pursuant to the act of April 11, 1872 (P.L.53, No.42).

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pennsylvania_Constitution_of_1776):
Pennsylvania Constitution of 1776 - Wikipedia The Pennsylvania Constitution of 1776 (ratified September 28, 1776) was the state's first constitution following its declaration of independence

[Doc 3](https://constitutioncenter.org/the-constitution/historic-document-library/detail/pennsylvania-constitution):
Pennsylvania Constitution (1776) The Pennsylvania Constitution of 1776 was, perhaps, the most democratic (and radical) of the state constitutions.
<search> South Carolina constitution effective date </search>

Search query: South Carolina constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.scstatehouse.gov/scconstitution/SCConstitution.pdf):
[PDF] THE CONSTITUTION OF THE STATE OF SOUTH CAROLINA 1895 ... 429, § 1, effective June 2, 1992, provides as follows: "SECTION 1. (A) As of March 7, 1973, the effective date of Article VIII of the South Carolina ...

[Doc 2](https://schistory.org/april-1868-south-carolinians-approve-a-new-constitution/):
April, 1868: South Carolinians Approve a New Constitution In April of 1868, men of all races in South Carolina got the chance to do something they never have before or since – vote in a public referendum on the state ...

[Doc 3](https://www.wistv.com/2025/07/22/we-people-original-south-carolina-constitution-be-displayed-2026/):
Original South Carolina Constitution to be displayed in 2026 - WIS South Carolina's original constitution will be put on display in March of 2026.
<search> Texas constitution effective date </search>

Search query: Texas constitution effective date
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Texas):
Constitution of Texas - Wikipedia The current document was adopted on February 15, 1876, and is the seventh constitution in Texas history (including the Mexican constitution of 1872). The ...

[Doc 2](https://ballotpedia.org/Texas_Constitution):
Texas Constitution - Ballotpedia The current Texas Constitution was adopted in 1876. Texas has had five state constitutions. The current state constitution has 17 articles. The current Texas ...

[Doc 3](https://www.tshaonline.org/handbook/entries/constitution-of-1876):
Constitution of 1876 - Texas State Historical Association It was framed by the Constitutional Convention of 1875 and adopted on February 15, 1876, by a vote of 136,606 to 56,652, and it remains the ...
